interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Onkessy Lip Gloss Base Primer for DIY Lip Gloss Make Your Own Lip Gloss DIY Handmade Lip Gloss Glaze Gel Waterproof Non-Stick Cup 50/80ML
Review Date: 2021/04/30
Store: Onkessy
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Onkessy', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Smoothening', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.43 x 3.07 x 1.26 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: The volume is accurate to the ad for the lipgloss base.  It works well, I mix with Shae butter, vitamin e and pigment.  It is a good volume for my daughter and I to make homemade lipgloss but if making gifts or anything more than a handful of tunes this is a small volume.  Mine did not come with the non stick bowl the ad mentions.  It seems a little pricey but works well and my sensitive skin does not react to it.
Review Title: Works well
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Dreamemo 48W UV LED Nail Lamp, with 4 Timer Setting, Professional Pink Nail Dryer for Gel Nail Polish Gel Nail Starter Kit for Fingernail and Toenail Curing
Dreamemo
{'Style': 'Traditional', 'Brand': 'Dreamemo', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Wattage': '48 watts', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 8.58 x 4.37 inches; 1.63 Pounds'}
Love this.  Great for nails and those of use who might be a little clumsy and "miss" the opening smearing polish on the light. Works great.  Lots of nails in it's future.
wide opening
Sam&Helen Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit, 5Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes And 2 Tubes Magnetic Eyeliners With Eyelash Applicator-No Glue Needed
Sam&Helen
{'Brand': 'Sam&Helen', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
I have a few friends who have tried similar products and I was curious.  The liner is thick and has almost a rubbery feel.  Even with makeup remover I found it quite challenging to remove.  Make sure to mix it before applying.  It took me three coats to get the lashes to stay.  Make sure to let it dry all the way.  The lash options are helpful to get the right look.
challenging to remove
Emilia Hypoallergenic Bath Oil for Babies - Paraben-Free Natural Baby Wash Enriched With Natural Oat Extract, Sunflower, Sweet Almond, Sesame, Calendula, and Chamomile 8.5 fl.oz.
Emilia
{'Brand': 'Emilia', 'Scent': 'Chamomile', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.81 x 2.05 x 1.85 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
I really like the smell.  It is easy to add to my daughters bath and she comes out soft and ready for night time.  It leaves her skin soft but not oily and doesn't cause her sensitive skin any trouble.
Relaxing
LAPOTHICELL Blemish Out Cream 50ml, Face Moisturizer, improves uneven skin tone.
LAPOTHICELL
{'Brand': 'LAPOTHICELL', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 3.42 Ounces'}
I've fallen in love with a couple Korean beauty products so I was excited to try this one.  It came in a cute little pink box.  The outside of the container was clean.  I have combination skin and I am prone to hormonal breakouts.  Using this twice a day seems to help my blemishes heal faster and not get as bad.  My skin feels very healthy after using this regularly.  I have sensitive skin and have not had any problems.
Great for blemishes
EZ Detangler Brush, Morgles 2 Pack Detangling Brush for Curly Hair Ez Hair Detangling Brush for Afro America/ African Hair 3a to 4c Wavy Hair
MORGLES
{'Brand': 'MORGLES', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Wavy,Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '9.69 x 2.99 x 1.38 inches; 6.38 Ounces'}
Really easy to use brush that is great for all hair types.  My daughter has curly hair and this brush makes it so much easier to brush her hair.  She is more willing to sit for me to brush and style her hair and doesn't complain.  Then she attempts to brush my hair (still developing that skill).
Great for tangly hair

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Preferences:** The user favors modern, straight hairstyles, particularly in bold colors like burgundy and ombre shades, valuing ease of use and a natural look in hair products.

- **Material Preference:** Prefers synthetic hair that mimics human hair quality, especially heat-resistant options.

- **Functional Features:** Appreciates realistic styling attributes such as pre-plucking and baby hair, reflecting a desire for authenticity in beauty products.

- **Review Focus:** The user emphasizes aesthetics, ease of application, and overall product satisfaction, especially regarding weight and presentation. They have shown a growing interest in beauty tools that enhance convenience and user experience.

- **Recent Interactions:** The user rated a skincare product 5.0 for its effectiveness in healing blemishes, highlighting an appreciation for products catering to specific skin needs, especially for sensitive and combination skin. They rated a beauty tool 3.0, citing challenges with removal, and reviewed a detangling brush with a perfect 5.0 rating for ease of use. Recently, they reviewed a lip gloss base primer, giving it 4.0 stars, noting its effectiveness for DIY projects while mentioning a discrepancy in advertised features. 

- **Review Trend:** Typically rates products around 4.0, assigning lower ratings when quality or usability does not meet expectations, demonstrating a strong emphasis on quality and convenience across all beauty applications.

Overall, the user maintains a holistic approach to beauty and skincare, prioritizing style, functionality, and product quality across both hair-related purchases and broader beauty and care products.
